text.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
text.title: A Tryst With Destiny
text.summary: In his inaugural address on August 14, 1947, Indian Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru speaks of India's painful past and his hopes for a future of freedom ending poverty, ignorance and disease in India while creating a prosperous, democratic and progressive nation.
